name: sink (itch) (sunnydaysadness)
description:
Deep underneath the waters of the bay, Cherie Vasil is forced to reflect on her life.

notes before playing:

Don't try to restart manually, it messes up the formatting for some weird reason - you'll have to just clear then refresh your browser.  sink uses clickable images and text to progress.  made for  #JoesAlot, as my recipant  for the fic spoops event.
